Detailed Description
Represents a wrapper for a single-objective optimization problem.
This class encapsulates a single-objective optimization problem provided via a Pagmo problem instance. It provides a fitness function for evaluating solutions and handles problem-specific details such as bounds.
decision variables in the problem.

Member Function Documentation
fitness() fitnessfcmaes.optimizer.single_objective fcmaes.optimizer.single_objectivefitness
fcmaes.optimizer.single_objective.fitness ( self, X)
Calculates the fitness value for a given input vector X using the problem's fitness function.
If any exception occurs during the calculation, it returns the maximum floating-point value as a fallback.
Parameters
X
The input vector for which the fitness value is to be
calculated.
Returns
float The fitness value calculated for the input vector X. Returns sys.float_info.max in case of an exception.

Pagmo problem instance containing the optimization problem.
Initializes an instance of the class with properties derived from the provided pagmo problem.
Parameters
pagmo_prob
A pagmo problem instance used to initialize the class. It is expected to contain methods get_name() and get_bounds(), which provide the name of the problem and its boundary values, respectively.
The provided pagmo problem instance.
